event.title: built by Nipponzan Myohoji buddhist order in 1993

data.event: Grafton is notable for having a Peace Pagoda, built by Nipponzan Myohoji buddhist order in 1993.

event.title: was formed from the towns of Troy and Petersburgh on March 20, 1807

data.event: Grafton was formed from the towns of Troy and Petersburgh on March 20, 1807, and even at this comparatively late day it had few inhabitants.
